member.name: T:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay
member.summary: Defines the various statuses of a strip bay in OzStrips.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_DEAD
member.summary: Indicates the strip is not currently active (inhibited).

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_PREA
member.summary: Indicates preactive strip state.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_CLEARED
member.summary: Indicates the strip has received a clearance.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_PUSHED
member.summary: Indicates the strip is cleared for pushback.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_TAXI
member.summary: Indicates the aircraft is cleared for taxi.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_HOLDSHORT
member.summary: Indicates the aircraft is holding short of the runway.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_RUNWAY
member.summary: Indicates the aircraft is cleared to enter/cross/use the runway.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_OUT
member.summary: Indicates the aircraft has departed.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_ARRIVAL
member.summary: Indicates the strip for an arriving aircraft, pending a landing clearance.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripBay.BAY_CIRCUIT
member.summary: Indicates the strip for an aircraft that is in the circuit.

member.summary: Defines the types of items that can be associated with a controller strip in air traffic control simulations.

member.summary: Represents a standard controller strip, used for managing individual flights.

member.summary: Represents a queue bar, used to visually separate or organize strips into manageable sections.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripItemType.BAR
member.summary: Indicates that the strip or section is blocked and cannot be used currently.

member.summary: key for a strip, used to identify it uniquely.

member.name: P:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripKey.Callsign
member.summary: Gets or sets the callsign of the aircraft.

member.name: P:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripKey.VatsimID
member.summary: Gets or sets the VATSIM ID of the aircraft.

member.name: P:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripKey.ADEP
member.summary: Gets or sets the departure airport of the aircraft.

member.summary: Gets or sets the destination airport of the aircraft.

member.name: M:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripKey.Matches(MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripKey)
member.summary: Whether this key matches another stripkey.

member.name: T:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripType
member.summary: Defines the types of air traffic operations for controller strips, distinguishing between arrivals, departures, and unspecified types.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripType.ARRIVAL
member.summary: Represents an arriving aircraft. Used for managing incoming flights to an airport.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripType.DEPARTURE
member.summary: Represents a departing aircraft. Used for managing outgoing flights from an airport.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripType.LOCAL
member.summary: Indicates a strip arriving and departing from the same aerodrme.

member.name: F:MaxRumsey.OzStripsPlugin.GUI.Shared.StripType.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Indicates a strip status of nil / not relevant.
